name: Manager IT
description:
Your responcibility:

  • Management and development of IT infrastructure
  • Implementation of IT standards, communication with HQ IT team
  • Establishing data exchange with HQ
  • Full IT support for retail stores, office, e-commerce: remote/onsite hardware and software
  • Administration and support of network and network equipment
  • Organization of network security
  • Organization of service desk
  • Server support
  • Working with user requests
  • Search & monitoring of contractors/SLA
  • Implementation of new IT solutions
  • IT project management (marking, 1C, etc.)

Offer:

  • Development with Marc O'Polo RUS
  • Professional implementation
  • Benefits: medical insurance, employee discounts, etc.
  • International corporate culture
  • Work-life balance and focus on the result
